name: io.github.llmsresearch/paperbanana
title: PaperBanana
description: Generate academic diagrams and statistical plots from text using multi-agent AI.

tools.name: generate_diagram
tools.description: Generate a methodology diagram from text context and caption

tools.name: generate_plot
tools.description: Generate a statistical plot from JSON data and intent description

tools.name: evaluate_diagram
tools.description: Compare a generated diagram against a human reference on 4 dimensions
